text: My name is Mansoor Ahmed, currently I'm working at Accenture Australia
as a Business and Technology Delivery Analyst.
Before joining the AWS re/Start program
I was working as a parking and compliance officer in local government.
After I lost my job, when COVID hit the world,
me and my family had a hard time.
At that time I decided to go ahead with AWS re/Start program
and I'm really glad on my decision.
Before this program, I knew very little about cloud computing.
After completing my training with AWS re/Start program
I have much more confidence and I built up a lot of knowledge.
This program is designed for anyone who has no background in cloud computing.
They can come forward and do this, like me.
I'm currently working as a System Analyst
and my job is to assist testing and development teams.
You know, I see a big hope that I can definitely make a difference in my life.
My next career move will be to become a Dev Ops Engineer.
I really like to be a part of this cloud computing because it's very exciting
and I think this is somthing that is more promising in the coming future.
